item.title: CVE-2021-45035|2024-09-17T04:29:09.861Z -- velneo -- velneo%20vclient
item.description: Velneo vClient on its 28.1.3 version, does not correctly check the certificate of authenticity by default. This could allow an attacker that has access to the network to perform a MITM attack in order to obtain the userÂ´s credentials.
